remarks: Derivative of a function restricted to a closed interval.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dvmptresicc.f $e |- F = ( x e. CC |-> A ) $.
dvmptresicc.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. CC ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dvmptresicc.fdv $e |- ( ph -> ( CC _D F ) = ( x e. CC |-> B ) ) $.
dvmptresicc.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. CC ) -> B e. CC ) $.
dvmptresicc.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
dvmptresicc.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) $.
dvmptresicc $p |- ( ph -> ( RR _D ( x e. ( C [,] D ) |-> A ) ) = ( x e. ( C (,) D ) |-> B ) ) $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d ph x $.
